name: Hydrogen
description: Hydrogen is a colorless, odorless gas at room temperature. It is the lightest and most abundant element in the universe.

name: Helium
description: Helium is a colorless, odorless gas that is lighter than air. It is the second most abundant element in the universe.

name: Lithium
description: Lithium is a soft, silvery-white metal. It is the lightest metal and the least dense solid element.

name: Beryllium
description: Beryllium is a hard, grayish metal. It is the fourth element in the periodic table and has the atomic number 4.
